Package no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.handlers

Class FilesChangeHandler

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.handlers.FilesChangeHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
bluej.extensions2.event.ClassListener
public class FilesChangeHandler extends Object implements bluej.extensions2.event.ClassListener
Represents a FilesChangeHandler, listening for file changes in class files and handles them. Implements BlueJ's ClassListener interface, and handles the events triggered by BlueJ. Should remove old Violations from the ViolationsManager, and if necessary reprocess the file.
